statements: SELECT * FROM sculptures_feedback WHERE id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating FROM sculptures_feedback WHERE sculpture_id = 10;
SELECT review_text FROM sculptures_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM sculptures_feedback ORDER BY date_reviewed DESC;
SELECT id, reviewer_name, rating FROM sculptures_feedback WHERE rating < 4 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sculptures_feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY date_reviewed DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating FROM sculptures_feedback WHERE sculpture_id = 5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT sculpture_id, reviewer_name, review_text FROM sculptures_feedback WHERE reviewer_name LIKE 'J%' AND rating <= 2;
SELECT sculpture_id, reviewer_name, date_reviewed FROM sculptures_feedback WHERE date_reviewed BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date_reviewed ASC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM sculptures_feedback;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating, review_text FROM feedbacks;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, material FROM sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, year_created FROM sculptures WHERE year_created > 2000;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating, created_at FROM feedbacks ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, review_text, rating FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM sculptures WHERE material = 'Marble' AND year_created > 2000;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, year_created FROM sculptures WHERE artist_name LIKE 'Da%' ORDER BY year_created ASC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text, rating FROM feedbacks WHERE LENGTH(review_text) > 100 AND rating < 4;
SELECT sculpture_id, sculpture_name, year_created FROM sculptures WHERE sculpture_name LIKE '%Statue' AND material IN ('Bronze', 'Gold') ORDER BY year_created DESC
SELECT * FROM Sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, year_created FROM Sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, material FROM Sculptures WHERE year_created > 2000;
SELECT * FROM Reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text, review_date FROM Reviews WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name FROM Sculptures WHERE year_created > 2000;
SELECT sculpture_name, material FROM Sculptures ORDER BY sculpture_name DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, year_created FROM Sculptures WHERE material = 'Bronze';
SELECT r.reviewer_name, r.rating, f.feedback_text FROM Reviews r JOIN Feedback f ON r.review_id = f.review_id WHERE r.rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT name, artist, year_created FROM sculptures WHERE year_created > 2000;
SELECT name, artist, description FROM sculptures WHERE artist='Leonardo da Vinci';
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY date_reviewed DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating, comment FROM reviews WHERE sculpture_id = 3 AND rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT name, artist, year_created FROM sculptures WHERE artist = 'Michelangelo';
SELECT name, artist, year_created FROM sculptures ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT id, name, artist FROM sculptures WHERE year_created > 1800 AND artist LIKE 'C%';
SELECT id, description FROM sculptures WHERE id IN (SELECT sculpture_id FROM acquisitions WHERE cost > 1000);
SELECT * FROM SculptureFeedback;
SELECT sculpture_id, feedback_text, rating FROM SculptureFeedback WHERE feedback_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, sculpture_material FROM SculptureInfo ORDER BY sculpture_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SculptureReviews WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01' AND review_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT acquisition_date, acquisition_source, acquisition_price FROM SculptureAcquisition WHERE acquisition_price > 1000 ORDER BY acquisition_date ASC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, sculpture_material FROM SculptureInfo
SELECT review_id, sculpture_id, reviewer_name, review_text, review_date FROM SculptureReviews ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT feedback_id, sculpture_id, feedback_text, rating, feedback_date FROM SculptureFeedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT * FROM SculptureDisplay WHERE display_date_start < '2022-01-01' AND display_date_end > '2022-01-01'
SELECT acquisition_id, sculpture_id, acquisition_source, acquisition_date, acquisition_price FROM SculptureAcquisition ORDER BY acquisition_price
